001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.cli.test;
002
003import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.cli.BaseJsonRpcTool;
004
005import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
006import java.io.PrintStream;
007import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
008
009/**
010 *  Support functions for testing command-line tools
011 */
012public interface CLITestSupport {
013
014    default String[] parseCommandLine(String line) {
015        return line.split(" ");
016    }
017
018    /**
019     * Run a command and capture status and output
020     *
021     * @param tool Command object instance to run
022     * @return Object containing status, stdout, stderr
023     */
024    default CLICommandResult runTool(BaseJsonRpcTool tool, String... args) throws UnsupportedEncodingException {
025        // Setup to capture output streams
026        ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
027        ByteArrayOutputStream bes = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
028        PrintStream cos = new PrintStream(bos);
029        PrintStream ces = new PrintStream(bes);
030
031        // Run the command
032        int status = tool.run(cos, ces, args);
033
034        return new CLICommandResult(status, bos, bes);
035    }
036}
